comment.body:
>Cannot find an annoyance filter

To enable `AdGuard Annoyances filter`, please open AdGuard app, tap on the second icon from the left on the bottom. Then tap on `Safari protection` -> `Filters` -> `Annoyances`, enable `AdGuard Annoyances filter` and update filters (like on the screenshots below).

<details><summary>Screenshots</summary>

![1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/a07356c2-84ff-4884-90d8-880dfbf0abf3)
![2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/8f20e832-7e94-4447-be97-e04dace5160c)

@AdguardTeam/filters-maintainers Could you please take a look?
